update oa_employee
update_time = now(),
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
custom_code = #{customCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
custom_price_num = #{customPriceNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
custom_name = #{customName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
join_date = #{joinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

updater = #{updater,jdbcType=BIGINT},

agreement_id = #{agreementId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update oa_employee set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, custom_code = #{customCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, custom_price_num = #{customPriceNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, custom_name = #{customName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, join_date = #{joinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_code = #{payCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_status = #{serviceStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, employment_form = #{employmentForm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = now(), updater = #{updater,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, agreement_id = #{agreementId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from oa_employee where is_del = 0
and code like concat('%',replace(#{paramMap.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%','/%'),'%') escape '/'
and name like concat('%',replace(#{paramMap.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%','/%'),'%') escape '/'
and id_card like concat('%',replace(#{paramMap.idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%','/%'),'%') escape '/'
and custom_name like concat('%',replace(#{paramMap.customName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%','/%'),'%') escape '/'
limit #{offset}, #{limit}
